summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 36th Avenue West, from Elmore Street to West Lawton Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9397 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
